word_mean: 溶质：溶于溶剂中的物质
溶液由溶质和溶剂组成

sentence.Network_en: In some cases the solute can associate in solution.
sentence.Network_cn: 在某些情况下,溶液中的溶质可以互相结合.

sentence.Network_en: When common salt is added to water, the salt is the solute.
sentence.Network_cn: 当食盐放在水里时, 食盐就是溶质.

sentence.Network_en: This solute will be referred to as a tracer.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Latin solutum, neuter of solutus 'loosened', past participle of the verb solvere

means.word_mean: 1. the dissolved substance in a solution; the component of a solution that changes its state

stems_affixes.word_buile: re再+solu溶解,解决,松开+te→adj.坚决的,果断的
solu溶解,解决,松开+able可以……的→soluble可溶的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 绝对的,完全的;确实的,肯定的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ab相反,不+solu溶解,解决,松开+te→绝不松开的→绝对的
ab离开+solu溶解,解决,松开+tion表名词→松开后离开
dis分开+solu溶解,解决,松开+tion表名词→松开分散→解散
solu溶解,解决,松开+te→n.溶解物, 溶质
